thread.title: InFocus launches M812, priced at Rs 19,999
thread.title_full: InFocus launches M812, priced at Rs 19,999 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: InFocus launches M812, priced at Rs 19,999
text:
NEW DELHI: InFocus has launched a new mid-range smartphone -- M812 -- priced at Rs 19,999. The registration for the sale of the smartphone begins on September 23 exclusively on Snapdeal. At this price, it competes with the likes of Gionee Elife S7, Xiaomi Mi 4 (64GB), and Motorola Moto X (Second-Gen). 

The smartphone runs Android 5.0 Lollipop and has a 5.5-inch Full-HD IPS display. 

Powered by a 2.5GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 processor and 3GB RAM, the smartphone offers 16GB internal storage. Users can slip in microSD cards of up to 128GB capacity for additional storage. 

InFocus M812 packs a 2,900mAh battery and comes with 13MP rear camera with dual-LED flash and 8MP front camera. 

The phone supports 3G, 4G, GPRS/EDGE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, microUSB 2.0 and GPS on connectivity front. 

Commenting on the launch, Sachin Thapar, country head said, "We have created the InFocus M812 as the most covetable epitome of design and performance. For the style-conscious Android lovers, we believe this flagship smartphone will become a symbol of exquisite aesthetics and an extension of their personality." General 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz 3G Network 850/900/1900/2100 MHz 4G Network 700(B28)/900(B8)/2600(B7)/1800(B3)/2100(B 1) MHz Display Size 5.5 inch screen Type Full HD Display, Memory Card Slot up to 128GB Internal 16GB, 3GB RAM Data GPRS Yes EDGE Yes Bluetooth Yes Camera Primary 13MP Secondary 8MP Features OS Android 5.0 CPU 2.5GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 Browser HTML5 Battery Battery Capacity 2,900mAh 7 hot smartphones with 3GB RAM under Rs 20,000 of 8 With economies of scale moving in the handset makers’ favour, a number of manufacturers have started offering phones with high-end specifications at a mid-range price.

RAM is one of the most critical hardware components -- more RAM translates into better multi-tasking performance and the ability to run multiple tasks in the background. 2GB RAM has almost become standard for mid-range phones but we even have some phones offering 3GB and 4GB of RAM. 

We take a look at seven smartphones that come with 3GB RAM priced under Rs 20,000. OnePlus One 16GB, available only in a white coloured variant, is a great ‘value for money’ phone that comes with 3GB RAM. 

OnePlus One sports top-of-the-line hardware specifications, including a 2.5GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 processor, 3GB RAM, a 5.5-inch 1080P display, 13MP camera with F2.0 aperture and Sony image sensor, 5MP front camera, 3,100mAh battery, 4G-support and and NFC. Xiaomi’s last flagship, Mi 4, is one of the company’s best selling phones. After a recent price cut you can get the 16GB variant at Rs 14,999 while the 64GB version retails at Rs 17,999.

Mi 4 has a 5-inch full-HD screen and is powered by a 2.5GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 quad-core processor and 3GB RAM. The phone runs MIUI 6, a new version of the company’s operating system, based on Android 4.4 KitKat. The phone sports a 13MP rear and 8MP front Sony stacked CMOS camera and a 3,080mAh battery. The Zenfone Laser comes in a 3GB RAM variant at a price of Rs 13,999. It is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 octa-core processor and has 16GB internal storage expandable up to 128GB via microSD card. 

It runs Android 5.0 (Lollipop) with a new version of Asus ZenUI — which has a fully-customizable interface. The phone sports a 5.5-inch HD (1280x720p) display with Gorilla Glass 4 protection. The phone sports a 13MP rear camera and a 5MP front-facing camera. Asus Zenfone Selfie is a dual-sim selfie-focused phone that runs Android 5.0 (Lollipop) with a new version of Asus ZenUI. Available at Rs 17,999, it is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 processor with 3GB RAM. This model has a 5.5-inch (1080x1920p) LCD display with Gorilla Glass 4 protection. 

Competing with HTC Desire Eye, Asus Zenfone Selfie comes with rear and front cameras of 13MP resolution, both with Toshiba sensor, laser autofocus and dual-LED (dual-tone) flash. It has a 3000mAh battery.
